Reviews.Title: Wrong part but still a good item if its what you need
Reviews.Author: Lewis Black "Two Chevys"
Reviews.Content: Like the title says, This item is good quality, easy to use, and performs its intended function, just make sure you research the part you need before purchasing. I was able to return it for a full refund, but still had to delay my equipment operating properly. My application required a more advanced unit, which I was not aware of since I had been out of the alarm business for several years now.
